channel.title: Npc Death
channel.description:
When you die against any npc players & moderators lose items & keep 3 items on death. When Administrators+ die they keep all items.
Never had this problem before so really need a fix for this.
Base is pi.

item.title: Npc Death
item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

I Vain I:

I’m trying to think of a way to see if the NPC killed the user.

Alright also ill explain once more to what I am trying to fix.

If a player or moderator dies to a npc like lets say to the corporeal beast & dies they loose items & keep only 3 items when they die. So I need it where if a player and moderator dies to any npc in game they keep what they are equipted with and whats in there inventory.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Death
item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

Still need a fix on this!

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Death
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Look for the giveLife() method in PlayerAssistant.java - says somewhere:

	c.getItems().dropAllItems(); // drop all items
	c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); // delete all items

I guess make it like this…

if((c.playerRights >= 1)) {
	c.getItems().dropAllItems(); // drop all items
	c.getItems().deleteAllItems(); // delete all items
}

No idea, might be … if((c.playerRights >= 1) {

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Well, to my knowledge there is no current checking to see if an NPC killed you or not.

I’ll keep looking around though.[/quote]

Thank you.

item.title: Npc Death
item.dc:creator: @zoomer zoomer
item.description:
@zoomer wrote:

Just died to a npc & I did what I vain I said.

Still lose items as a player & keeps 3 items on death.

I want it so when a player dies to a npc they keep there items every item they have on & in inventory.

Read full topic

[quote=“zoomer, post:5, topic:389668”]I was just stating that administrators+ don’t lose items.

This has nothing to do with staff losing items read the post more clearly next time please.

item.title: Npc Death
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

oh lol be more specific…

Okay Search this is PlayerAssistant.Java

if(c.duelStatus <= 4 && !c.getPA().inPitsWait() && !c.inFightCaves()) { // if we are not in a duel we must be in wildy so remove items

Now Right Under It add

if (!c.inPits && c.playerRights != 0) {
so in all it should look something like this
f(c.duelStatus <= 4 && !c.getPA().inPitsWait() && !c.inFightCaves()) { // if we are not in a duel we must be in wildy so remove items if (!c.inPits && c.playerRights != 0) { c.getItems().resetKeepItems(); if((c.playerRights == 2 && Config.ADMIN_DROP_ITEMS) || c.playerRights != 2) { if(!c.isSkulled) { // what items to keep c.getItems().keepItem(0, true); c.getItems().keepItem(1, true); c.getItems().keepItem(2, true); }

Read full topic
